import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { Link, useParams, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { Table, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { listUsers } from '../actions/userActions' function UserListScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const {loading, error, users} = userList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listUsers()) },[dispatch,]) return (

Users

{ loading ? () : error ? ({error}) : ( {users.map(user => ( ))}
ID Name Email ADMIN
{user._id} {user.name} {user.email} {user.isAdmin ? ( ) : ( )}
)}
) } export default UserListScreen
